This will create a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. This concludes the instructions for Part 1. Proceed similarly for subsequent parts. Ensure each part is numbered, described, and drawn in a clear, concise, and organized manner. If any doubt, consult the assembly JSON file or appropriate documentation.</description>
